name: PrivateSniper's Style :: YouTube v1.8 ::

user.name: PrivateSniper
user.about: Welcome to my UserStyles.org profile, alot of my styles are related to adblocking, some of my styles also include color theme options (usually just the color theme I have used but I am willing to add multi-choice if requested). I am more than happy to receive requests if your patient. Style Options Styles who's descriptions end with :: indicate that they have options which can be configured (this is a new pattern I am using to be able to quickly locate styles with or without options.

additional_info:
v1.0 - Removes the Announcement Box and Adverts v1.1 - Removes the Footer, Copyright notice and Google Chrome promotion v1.1b - Also removes the promoted video's - I don't like them :P v1.2
  • Removed the What's New box
  • Removes more Advert boxes
v1.3 - Added Vista style Bars with white Font v1.4 - Removed additional Advert frames v1.5 - Removes the "Wonder Wheel" Advert Linky Frame v1.6 - Removes the Channel Branding (advertisement) v1.7 - sets page background to dark (optional) v1.8 - Added dark header to dark theme

style_setting_options.label: Enable Dark
